+#include <jni.h>
+#include <string.h>
+
+static jint* pinned;
+
+JNIEXPORT void JNICALL
+Java_gc_jni_JNICriticalSupport_get(JNIEnv *env, jclass unused, jintArray a) {
+  pinned = (*env)->GetPrimitiveArrayCritical(env, a, 0);
+}
+
+JNIEXPORT void JNICALL
+Java_gc_jni_JNICriticalSupport_release(JNIEnv *env, jclass unused, jintArray a) {
+  (*env)->ReleasePrimitiveArrayCritical(env, a, pinned, 0);
+}
